text: The Tajikistan Football Federation () is the governing body of football in Tajikistan. The federation was founded in 1936 in the Tajikistan SSR as a sub- federation of the Soviet Football Federation. It was not until 1994 when the Federation was accepted by the international community including the continental and global associations. ==Association staff== {|class="wikitable hlist" style="text-align:left" !Name !Position !Source |- | Rustam Emomali |President |https://www.fifa.com/associations/association/tjk/about |- | Khurshed Mirzo |Vice President |https://www.fifa.com/associations/association/tjk/about |- | Dilshod Juraev |2nd Vice President |https://www.fifa.com/associations/association/tjk/about |- | Alisher Urunov |3rd Vice President |https://www.fifa.com/associations/association/tjk/about |- | Davlatmand Islomov |General Secretary |https://www.fifa.com/associations/association/tjk/about |- | Sherali Kholov |Treasurer |https://www.fifa.com/associations/association/tjk/about |- | Salokhidin Gafurov |Technical Director |https://www.fifa.com/associations/association/tjk/about |- | Usmon Toshev |Team Coach (Men's) |https://www.fifa.com/associations/association/tjk/about |- | Ildar Rakhmanov |Team Coach (Women's) |https://www.fifa.com/associations/association/tjk/about |- | Dejan Đedović |Futsal Team Coach (Men's) |http://fft.tj/serbskij-spetsialist-deyan-dedovich- vozglavil-sbornuyu-tadzhikistana-po-futzalu/ |- | Faridum Saliev |Media/Communications Manager |https://www.fifa.com/associations/association/tjk/about |- | Damir Kameletdinov |Futsal Coordinator |https://www.fifa.com/associations/association/tjk/about |- | Abdurakhim Babaev |Referee Coordinator |https://www.fifa.com/associations/association/tjk/about |- |} ==References== ==External links== *Official website * Tajikistan at the FIFA website. * Tajikistan at AFC site Category:Football in Tajikistan Category:Sports organizations established in 1936 Tajikistan
